thread.title: Gabriella Pirisi Intemann
thread.title_full: Laptopscreen reviewed by Gabriella Pirisi Intemann

author: Gabriella Pirisi Intemann
title: Gabriella Pirisi Intemann
text: It was easy to find the right screen and it arrived in record time. With the video tutorial it was easy for a first timer to change the laptop screen, it took no time at all. I am happy I bought the tools which made the job even easier.
